name: MEC Edge Chalk Bag - Unisex
description:
The perfect companion to help you with your next big route. This chalk bag is slightly tapered to sit flat against your body and has a small stash pocket to keep your keys or phone close by.Made of burly polyester with a soft polyester fleece lining.Stiffened top and bottom add structure to make it easy to get at your chalk.15mm polyester webbing belt with buckle.Cinching drawcord closure secures your chalk when not in use.Brush holder loop keeps a brush close at hand for those greasy holds.Small zippered stash pocket has a key clip to keep essentials close at hand.

        Sustainability
